item.title: Install node.js packages via npm with a Chef Cookbook
item.author: Kevin Sookocheff
item.description:
I wanted to set up a Vagrant instance with node.js and some specific packages pre-installed. I found a Chef cookbook to install node and after a bit of work have a cookbook that will install arbitrary node packages through npm. I based this heavily on balbeko’s chef-npm cookbook with modifications to accept a data bag list of npm packages. Any packages in this list will be installed by Chef.

Behold! My first Chef cookbook.
